title: StereoSampleGAN
broadDescription: StereoSampleGAN is a lightweight machine learning approach high fidelity stereo audio sample generation

details.point: Introduces a novel machine learning architecture to generate stereo, time-frequency representations of audio samples.
Research project pending publishing, continuation of UCLA COSMOS 2024 Research.

title: Quickscout
broadDescription: Quickscout is FRC604's novel scouting application

details.point: Led development of flexible application to effectively capture and visualize FRC competition data.
Trained 10+ team members in web dev to build app and adapt to yearly games. 130+ users on FRC604, data collected for 700+ robots.

title: Domotron (FRC604 2024 Robot)
broadDescription: Domotron is a high-performance competitive robot designed excel in the 2024 FRC Game "Crescendo"

details.point: Developed physics-based shot calculations, driver control automation, competitive autonomous routines. Designed climber winch mechanism and vertical elevator.
Ranked 4/300 California teams, 12/3500 internationally. World championship division and two time California regional event winning robot.

images.alt: Domotron in motion at the World Championships
Domotron climbing the stage at the end of a Sacramento Regional QM75
Domotron shooting a note in some Sacramento Reiognal match
Domotron's autonomous routine in action at the Monterey Bay Regional QM8

title: VelocityDraft
broadDescription: VelocityDraft is a flexible essay writing scheduler webapp

details.point: Leverages user writing abilities and essay deadlines to algorithmically determine best order of essay writing. Third place project in OneHacks III Hackathon.

title: Digital Audio Production
broadDescription: Create professional full length compositions and songs

details.point: Learning audio production, synthesis, and engineering since July 2022, building artist brand, participating in wordwide music collaborations and production competitions.
Understand physical applications of signal processing and manipulation to produce desired sounds
Create professional full length compositions and song, gained 178,000+ streams in 2 years.
